@graph.name: Best OSHA Kits for Electrical Contractors

itemListElement.name: North by Honeywell Electrical Safety Kit
itemListElement.description: Comprehensive PPE kit designed for NFPA 70E and OSHA compliance on electrical jobs.

itemListElement.name: BRADY Electrical Lockout/Tagout Kit
itemListElement.description: Essential LOTO kit to keep electrical jobs safe and OSHA-compliant.

itemListElement.name: Klein Tools Electrician's Jobsite Kit
itemListElement.description: OSHA-aligned safety essentials packed for the everyday electrical pro.

itemListElement.name: 3M Electrical PPE Compliance Kit
itemListElement.description: Top-tier personal protection gear engineered to exceed OSHA standards.

itemListElement.name: Saf-T-Gard Electrical Safety Starter Kit
itemListElement.description: Affordable, OSHA-aligned kit for new or small electrical crews.

mainEntity.name: Do these kits meet OSHA standards for electrical work?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes — each kit is curated with OSHA and NFPA 70E requirements in mind, ensuring you're inspection-ready from day one.

mainEntity.name: Which kit is best for arc flash protection?

acceptedAnswer.text: The North by Honeywell and 3M kits both include arc-rated PPE designed for high-risk electrical environments.

mainEntity.name: Can I use these kits for team training or audits?

acceptedAnswer.text: Absolutely — these kits are ideal for preparing crews for safety audits, on-site inspections, and OSHA-compliant training sessions.
